title: Chittagong- A Perfect Destination for Those Who Enjoy Affordable Vacations (flightsfromluton flights)
text: By flightsfromluton flights Aug 7, 2015 Chittagong has been catching the attention of travel enthusiasts planning for full-filled vacation with their loved ones. Located in Bangladesh, Chittagong is one of those places in South Asia known for its majestic charm that is sure to give a life time experience to a number of travellers. From rich historic culture to magnificent streets- Chittagong has it all. Being the second-largest city in Bangladesh, Chittagong is a pleasant place to stay for tourists around the world. The city offers gateways to the most beguiling corners of Bangladesh while maintaining its identity as the main port city. The city of Chittagong bristles with some truly impressive destinations that are all set to blow its visitors' mind. The city caters the interest of a large number of travellers with its splendid mountain, beaches, rivers and quirky streets. Chittagong is also called the town of Aulias (Muslim saints). If sandy beaches, dense forests and green hills are the things that pique your interest instantly, then Chittagong is a place you must visit. Chittagong boasts both traditional and modern ingredients that are relevant to attract the attention of a wide range of travellers. Irrespective of all the hustle and bustle surrounding Chittagong, travellers can always find reasons to praise cool breezes and magical views offered by the city. Visiting Chittagong, travellers can take a leisurely walk by Foy's lake or admire the beauty of Bayazid Bostami's shrine. The shrine is famous for its history and cultural significance. Similarly, the shrine of Shah Amanat is also one of the favourite destinations among travellers. The shrine is known to be blessed with natural wonders and plays an important role in shaping the history of Bangladesh. You can also choose to visit one of the largest mosques of the city called Baitul Falah and cherish its architectural beauty and numerous arches. If you are a fun-loving person, then you can surely plan a day to hit the golden beaches of Cox's bazaar or visit St Martin Island. The delicious cuisines of Bangladesh also deserve a mention here as they have everything to delight your taste buds and make you feel more connect to the world of food. Although they are a bit spicy, but they are surely going to impress you with their flavours. Chittagong enthusiasm for embracing people from around the world isn't unknown. It has everything to make a traveller feel rejuvenated and excited without breaking the bank. You can always book tickets and plan a pleasure-filled vacation in Chittagong anytime whenever you feel like taking a break from your busy schedule.
